lyric:
[00:02.80]See ya never gone my way
[00:08.00]Better will someday
[00:12.24]Never far away
[00:18.50]See ya never gone my way
[00:23.99]Better on my stay
[00:28.48]Never far away
[00:34.06]Round and round and I never know why
[00:39.39]Round and round and it will show us way out
[00:42.48]It's my delight
[00:50.58]As day goes by you hold on tight another day
[00:57.34]You're wondering why but you know why no other way
[01:04.95]Somedays the sun will shine down
[01:07.36]Somedays the moon will cry
[01:11.35]Tomorrow we'll see
[01:15.36]Tomorrow we'll be
[01:17.36]As we go on our way
[01:23.28]The world in your eyes forever is lie as we go on our way
[01:30.22]There is a thousand things to know
[01:38.39]Sometimes we're standing by the things we never understand
[01:47.13]As we go on our own way
[02:10.19]The sun goes down
[02:12.76]The tides are low
[02:16.16]I'll see you on the day
[02:19.56]Letting you go on your way
[02:27.99]See ya never gone my way
[02:33.13]Never we'll someday
[02:38.02]Never far away
[02:43.89]See ya never gone my way
[02:46.31]Never on my day
[02:49.85]Never far away
[03:00.23]Round and round and I never know why
[03:03.88]Round and round and it will show us way out
[03:10.51]It's my delight
tlyric:
[by:Slience_Park]
[00:02.80]看到你从未离开这条路
[00:08.00]总有一天希望会点亮
[00:12.24]请别走远
[00:18.50]看到你从未离开这条路
[00:23.99]留下会更好
[00:28.48]请别走远
[00:34.06]一圈圈的跑下去吧，虽然前路未卜
[00:39.39]一圈圈的跑下去，它就会指引我们前行的路
[00:42.48]这是属于我的快乐
[00:50.58]时光飞逝，你又拥有新的一天
[00:57.34]你会困惑，但你明白为何没有其他的路
[01:04.95]虽然太阳的光辉也会消逝
[01:07.36]虽然月亮也会擦拭泪水
[01:11.35]明天我们会看到希望
[01:15.36]明天终会到来
[01:17.36]当我们继续踏上征途
[01:23.28]尽管你眼中的世界遍布谎言，我们仍要砥砺前行
[01:30.22]你该知道世事无常
[01:38.39]有时我们所坚持的东西就连我们自己也不能理解
[01:47.13]但我们仍要继续前行
[02:10.19]日落西山
[02:12.76]潮水退去
[02:16.16]我们会在那天相遇
[02:19.56]让你继续出发
[02:27.99]看到你从未离开这条路
[02:33.13]没有如果
[02:38.02]从不走远
[02:43.89]看到你从未离开这条路
[02:46.31]没有后悔
[02:49.85]从不走远
[03:00.23]一圈圈的跑下去吧，虽然前路未卜
[03:03.88]一圈圈的跑下去，它就会指引我们前行的路
[03:10.51]这是属于我的快乐
